channel.title: [Project Insanity] trouble with commands

item.title: [Project Insanity] trouble with commands
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

Here:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bank") && c.playerRights >= 1) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.getPA().openUpBank(); }

if (playerCommand.startsWith("master") && c.playerRights >= 2) { if (c.inWild()) return; for (int j = 0; j < 21; j++) { c.playerXP[j] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[j] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[j]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(j); } }

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && c.playerRights >= 3) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2851, 3677, 0); c.sendMessage("You are Now in the staffr Zone!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] trouble with commands
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

I’m not sure if this will work. But it seem’s you have put an I instead of a 1

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] trouble with commands
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Lol nub…that doesn’t matter. Make sure you’re placing the commands in their right place. Just search for some other commands and add them their if you don’t know where to add them.

item.title: [Project Insanity] trouble with commands
item.dc:creator: @taintedhappy taintedhappy
item.description:
@taintedhappy wrote:

i cant make any commands lol iv tried to make ::bank/::master even adding items to my inv ones there is always somthing wrong with the code is there a new format i have to use now? here are some commands iv tried to add:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }
if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights > 2) { toX = 2981; toY = 9913; sM("staff zone ftw!."); }
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && playerRights > 2 && !isInPitGame()) { openUpBank(); }

Read full topic
